# Edit idf

## Description
Change time step

## Modeler Description
Will change time step

## Measure Type
EnergyPlusMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Time step in an hour

**Name:** time_step,
**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

**Name:** pcm_index,
**Type:** Integer,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
